name: CountryFlagQuiz
0:
”Alexa, start country flag quiz”
”Alexa, open the country flag quiz”
”Alexa launch country flag quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country flag quiz
des:
Trivia game using amazon Alexa and the Alexa app. A country's flag will be shown on the home screen of your Alexa app, and you will have to guess what country it belongs to.

Start the skill by saying "Alexa, start the country flag quiz"

Be sure to have a smartphone or computer on hand with access to the Amazon Alexa app or alexa.amazon.com, as the country flags will be displayed on a card on the app home screen.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
